snippet: While Congress is away, 2.3 million Americans are left to worry about whether lawmakers will ever act to renew unemployment benefits.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Congress for delaying renewal of federal unemployment benefits, which expired at the end of 2013; contends Republicans bear most of the blame.
lead_paragraph: While Congress is away, 2.3 million Americans are left to worry about whether lawmakers will ever act to renew unemployment benefits.

headline.main: No Spring Break for the Unemployed
headline.print_headline: No Spring Break for the Unemployed
